attributes.action: UK parliament must condemn terrorist attack on Indian forces by JeM & supporters
attributes.additional_details: The UK as a world leader needs to go beyond the generic government press releases and FCO Twitter messages about this ghastly attack and have our Parliament to wholeheartedly condemn the perpetuators of this attack & its supporters and to express solidarity with India who are also a leading Commonwealth nation.
attributes.background: 14-Feb-19 convoy with Indian security personnel attacked by suicide bomber in Pulwama, 44 dead. Responsibility claimed by Pakistan-based militant group Jaish-e-Mohd. This was a non-combat situation - so this a blatant terrorist attack. UK Parliament must condemn the perpetuators & its supporters.
